info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A HEAVY RAIN SHOWER WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MECKLENBURG AND NORTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES UNTIL 800 PM EDT... At 727 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a heavy rain shower 9 miles northeast of Indian Land, or near Stallings, moving southeast at 15 mph. Locations to be impacted include... South Charlotte, Matthews, Indian Trail, Weddington, Stallings, Wesley Chapel, Lake Park and Hemby Bridge. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
